title: How free-to-play Fortnite became a money machine
text:
How free-to-play Fortnite became a money machine 10:07am EDT - 02:13
Millions of people are obsessed with Epic Games' Fortnite Battle Royale, a free-to-play game that has become a money-making machine for both the creators and live-streaming gamers who've mastered it. Jillian Kitchener reports.
